title: Multiple-bubble testing in the cryptocurrency market: a case study of bitcoin. (arXiv:2401.05417v1 [q-fin.ST])
abstract: Economic periods and financial crises have highlighted the importance of evaluating financial markets to investors and researchers in recent decades.
context:
Title: Multiple-bubble testing in the cryptocurrency market: a case study of bitcoin. (arXiv:2401.05417v1 [q-fin.ST])
Abstract: Economic periods and financial crises have highlighted the importance of evaluating financial markets to investors and researchers in recent decades.
translated_title: 加密货币市场中的多泡泡测试：比特币的案例研究
translated_abstract: 过去几十年中，经济周期和金融危机凸显了对投资者和研究者评估金融市场的重要性。
tldr: 本研究通过比特币为例，进行了加密货币市场的多泡泡测试，并强调了评估金融市场对投资者和研究者的重要性。
en_tdlr: This study conducts multiple-bubble testing in the cryptocurrency market using bitcoin as a case study, highlighting the importance of evaluating financial markets to investors and researchers.
